51 namespace pilz_industrial_motion_planner
52 {
53 static const std::string PARAM_NAMESPACE_LIMTS = "robot_description_planning";
54 
55 bool CommandPlanner::initialize(const moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr& model, const std::string& ns)
56 {
57  // Call parent class initialize
58  planning_interface::PlannerManager::initialize(model, ns);
59 
60  // Store the model and the namespace
61  model_ = model;
62  namespace_ = ns;
63 
64  // Obtain the aggregated joint limits
65  aggregated_limit_active_joints_ = pilz_industrial_motion_planner::JointLimitsAggregator::getAggregatedLimits(
66  ros::NodeHandle(PARAM_NAMESPACE_LIMTS), model->getActiveJointModels());
67 
68  // Obtain cartesian limits
69  cartesian_limit_ = pilz_industrial_motion_planner::CartesianLimitsAggregator::getAggregatedLimits(
70  ros::NodeHandle(PARAM_NAMESPACE_LIMTS));
71 
72  // Load the planning context loader
73  planner_context_loader = std::make_unique<pluginlib::ClassLoader<PlanningContextLoader>>(
74  "pilz_industrial_motion_planner", "pilz_industrial_motion_planner::PlanningContextLoader");
75 
76  // List available plugins
77  const std::vector<std::string>& factories = planner_context_loader->getDeclaredClasses();
78  std::stringstream ss;
79  for (const auto& factory : factories)
80  {
81  ss << factory << " ";
82  }
83 
84  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Available plugins: " << ss.str());
85 
86  // Load each factory
87  for (const auto& factory : factories)
88  {
89  ROS_INFO_STREAM("About to load: " << factory);
90  PlanningContextLoaderPtr loader_pointer(planner_context_loader->createInstance(factory));
91 
92  pilz_industrial_motion_planner::LimitsContainer limits;
93  limits.setJointLimits(aggregated_limit_active_joints_);
94  limits.setCartesianLimits(cartesian_limit_);
95 
96  loader_pointer->setLimits(limits);
97  loader_pointer->setModel(model_);
98 
99  registerContextLoader(loader_pointer);
100  }
101 
102  return true;
103 }
104 
105 std::string CommandPlanner::getDescription() const
106 {
107  return "Pilz Industrial Motion Planner";
108 }
109 
110 void CommandPlanner::getPlanningAlgorithms(std::vector<std::string>& algs) const
111 {
112  algs.clear();
113 
114  for (const auto& context_loader : context_loader_map_)
115  {
116  algs.push_back(context_loader.first);
117  }
118 }
119 
120 planning_interface::PlanningContextPtr
121 CommandPlanner::getPlanningContext(const planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr& planning_scene,
122  const moveit_msgs::MotionPlanRequest& req,
123  moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes& error_code) const
124 {
125  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Loading PlanningContext for request\n<request>\n" << req << "\n</request>");
126 
127  // Check that a loaded for this request exists
128  if (!canServiceRequest(req))
129  {
130  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("No ContextLoader for planner_id " << req.planner_id.c_str() << " found. Planning not possible.");
131  return nullptr;
132  }
133 
134  planning_interface::PlanningContextPtr planning_context;
135 
136  if (context_loader_map_.at(req.planner_id)->loadContext(planning_context, req.planner_id, req.group_name))
137  {
138  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Found planning context loader for " << req.planner_id << " group:" << req.group_name);
139  planning_context->setMotionPlanRequest(req);
140  planning_context->setPlanningScene(planning_scene);
141  return planning_context;
142  }
143  else
144  {
145  error_code.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::PLANNING_FAILED;
146  return nullptr;
147  }
148 }
149 
150 bool CommandPlanner::canServiceRequest(const moveit_msgs::MotionPlanRequest& req) const
151 {
152  return context_loader_map_.find(req.planner_id) != context_loader_map_.end();
153 }
154 
155 void CommandPlanner::registerContextLoader(
156  const pilz_industrial_motion_planner::PlanningContextLoaderPtr& planning_context_loader)
157 {
158  // Only add if command is not already in list, throw exception if not
159  if (context_loader_map_.find(planning_context_loader->getAlgorithm()) == context_loader_map_.end())
160  {
161  context_loader_map_[planning_context_loader->getAlgorithm()] = planning_context_loader;
162  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Registered Algorithm [" << planning_context_loader->getAlgorithm() << "]");
163  }
164  else
165  {
166  throw ContextLoaderRegistrationException("The command [" + planning_context_loader->getAlgorithm() +
167  "] is already registered");
168  }
169 }
170 
171 } // namespace pilz_industrial_motion_planner
